contest-event.event-date:
May 16, 1870 D Sheffield Contest
Sheffield Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
sheffield-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Queen's Hotel Grounds, Sheffield It was a condition that each band should consist of 40 players, meaning bands had to go to considerable trouble and expense to find the extra players.
Prizes: £30, £20, £12, reduced from £100, £50, £25, £10 as fewer than 2000 people attended.
Also cornet solo contest.
Nov. 11, 2011, 2:44 p.m. Aug. 26, 2017, 9:55 p.m.
1 Chesterfield Matlock and Clay Cross United Thomas Tallis Trimnell Herculaneum
2 Yorkshire Evening Post Band Richard Smith Maritana [unknown arranger]
3 Dewsbury Rifle Corps Benjamin Denton Jackson 'Worthy is the Lamb' from 'The Messiah' [unknown arranger]
4 Sheffield Artillery and Rotherham Rifles United Henry Saville Maritana [unknown arranger]
Withdrawn Bacup Old Unknown
